title: Asperger Syndrome: The OASIS Guide, Revised Third Edition: Advice, Inspiration, Insight, and Hope, from Early Intervention to Adulthood
description: For the parents of children with Asperger Syndrome who want the latest and most up-to-date information on coping with the disease.A practical and comprehensive parent's guide to diagnosing, intervening, and coping with children with Asperger Syndrome (AS), a high-functioning form of autism, by the founder of the internationally renowned OASIS website. With two completely revised chapters and substantive updates scattered throughout.
author: Patricia Romanowski Bashe
